brtag pa gnyis kyi kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs s+ho// // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po g+ha ya d+ha ri zhal snga nas kyang / dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// fol. 1-35a missing, probably containing the equivalent of 417 and the beginning of 418 combined in one text, cf. Eimer 1999, n.10; 1 miniature on 42a

42a4-84b8 'phags pa mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur zhes bya ba brgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i brtag pa arya DA ki ni badz+ra paN+dza ra mahA tan+t+ra ra dza kal+pa nA mA 'phags pa mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba rdo rje gur rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i brtag pa rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur baʼo //
1. thams cad kyi rnam pa mchog du zhi baʼi sems can 'jug ba'i le'u ste MW3CN1302rgyud Ka13CN1304rgyud

84b8-115b4 dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le zhes bgyi rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i mnga' bdag shri mahA mu tra ti la kaM na ma maha yo gi ni tan tra ra dza a thIM ra dzaM dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i mnga' bdag zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi slob dpon rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shes rab dpal gsang ba'i zhal sngar/ kam chos kyi ye shes dang/ phyag mtshams dgra bcoM gyis dad cing gus pas zhus te bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa//

122b3-170b7 dpal ye shes thig le rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po mchog tu rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba shrI dz+nyA na ti la ka yo ki ni tan tra rA dza pa ra ma mahA aM b+hu taM na ma dpal ye shes thig le rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po shri dz+nya gu pa tas bsgyur cing/ zhus te gtan la phab pa/ slad kyis dpal sa skya'i dben gnas su legs par zhus dag go/ /dge'o//

423 Ts01.6 MW3CN1302rgyud Ka13CN1304rgyud
170b7-179a2 dpal de kho na nyid kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shri twad pra ti paM na mahA yo gi tan tra ra dza dpal rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgyal po mchog chen po rmad du byung zhing rmad du byung ba de kho na nyid kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po prad nya shri g+hu pa tas bsgyur cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa/ dus phyis dpal sa skya'i dben gnas su shAkya'i btsun pa slob dpon dpal rin grogs mched gnyis pos zhus te dag par byas so// //dge bo/ dag go//

? 382 Ts01.7 MW3CN1302rgyud Ka13CN1304rgyud
179a2-316a8 rgyud thams cad kyi gling bzhi gsang ba dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po sar+ba tan+t+ra ni dA na ra s+ye shri saM pu Ti ud b+ha ba lakA NaM na ma mahA tan tra rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po chen po dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i thig le zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka yasta bag+ha ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong shA kya yai shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa'o// slad nas yang bod kyi lo tsa ba gzhan rnams/ gzhan gyis sbgyur ba la zur mi 'dra bar bcos nas/ rang gi ming bcug cing gzhan gyi ming phye ba de dag dang/ mi shes pa de dag sun dbyung pa'i phyir/ slad nas yang rgya gar gyi rgyud bzhi dang/ dge slong shAkya ye shes de nyid kyis btugs nas/ bcos te gtan la phab pa'o// //dpal ldan sa skya dam pa'i chos 'byung ba'i gtsug lag khang du/ shAkya'i btsun pa dpal ldan rin chen gyis rnam yeng le 'e spangs nas dag par zhus pa lags so/ dge'o// rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi gzang ba/ dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba'i rtag pa'i rgyal po ste dang po rdzogs s+ho//MW3CN1302rgyud Ka13CN1304rgyud
191b1 rgyud thams cad kyi gleng bzhi gsang ba dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba las/ brtag pa'i rgyal po gnyis pa'o//MW3CN1302rgyud Ka13CN1304rgyud
202a3 dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba ste/ brtag pa'i rgyal po gsum pa'o//MW3CN1302rgyud Ka13CN1304rgyud
211b2 rgyud thams cad kyi gsang pa dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i brda' ste/ brtag pa'i rgyal po bzhi pa'o//MW3CN1302rgyud Ka13CN1304rgyud
214b8 dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las/ byung ba las spyod pa'i brtag pa ste lnga pa'o//MW3CN1302rgyud Ka13CN1304rgyud
223a7 yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud chen po las/ byung ba'i dpyid kyi thig le zhes bya ba'i rtag pa'i rgyal po ste/ drug pa'o//MW3CN1302rgyud Ka13CN1304rgyud
233b2 dpal yang dag par byung ba'i rgyud chen po las thams cad kyi bsam gtan 'byung ba zhes bya ba rtag pa'i rgyal po ste bdun pa rdzogs s+ho//MW3CN1302rgyud Ka13CN1304rgyud
266a3 dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba bya ba thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i rtag pa'i rgyal po ste brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho//MW3CN1302rgyud Ka13CN1304rgyud
273b1 dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba/ /bya ba bzhi'i de kho na'i rgyal po ste/ brtag pa dgu pa'o//MW3CN1302rgyud Ka13CN1304rgyud
280a2 rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba de kho na nyid thams cad kyi gleng bzhi brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po ste/ bcu pa rdzogs s+ho//MW3CN1302rgyud Ka13CN1304rgyud
283b5 text divided in later times: chap 1-10 - preserved only in X Cha.5, and 283b5-end = rkts 382
X Cha.5; 283b5-end = D 382, Ga 158b7-184a7 and X Ba.4 ca. gleich lang wie D; Mu Ka.7 ? 283b/ph 266/4ff.: rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba de kho na nyid thams cad kyi gleng bzhi brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po ste/ bcu pa rdzogs s+ho// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po lasogs pas yang mchod pa byas nas/ phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /thig le thig le dag gi don/ /gtan phab yang dag gsal gsungs na/ ... X Ka.7 266b1ff.: Titel, ... phyag 'thsal lo; dann gleich - mit Varianten the colophon, except the last sentence,equals that of D382, X Ba.4 has only the first sentence; X Cha.5 ganz anders !!
368 Ts02.1 MW3CN1302rgyud Kha23CN1305rgyud
1b1-40b4 rgyud kyi rgyal po bde mchog nyung ngu zhes bya ba tan t+ra rA dza sh+ri la gha sam bA ra na ma rdzogs+ho// dge'o// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad ma ka ra bar ma dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ slad kyis pan Ti ta chen po su ma ti kIr ti dang/ lo tsha ba mal ban d+he blo gros grags kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ le'u lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// MW3CN1302rgyud Kha23CN1305rgyud
40b2f.
title chapter-ending: he ru ka mngon par brjod pa, dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa, dpal 'khor lo sdom pa, dpal 'khor lo sdom pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po, chap. 51 D368, Ka.9 213b1-246b7; Mu Kha.1; X Ka.1

40b4-187b4 nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po a bi da nod ta ra tan t+ra nA ma mahA tan t+ra ra dza nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs s+ho// sngon byung brnyas min bla ma'i bka' bskul phyir/ /mkhas mchog ku ma ra dang lo tsha ba/ /dge slong byang chub shes rab ces bya bas/ /bcos sgyur gtan la phab la mkhas/ /mchog 'di la ni bzod pa mdzod/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dpal dz+nya ni sh+ri dang/ dge slong blo gros snying po dang/ dge slong rab bzhis bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o//

200b4-239b8 dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba sh+ri he ru ka ya b+hud+h+ya ya na ma dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba/ rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pan Ti ta chen po a twa bdz+ra dang/ bod kyi lo tsha ba la bcings yon tan 'bar gyis zhus te/ gtan la phab pa'o// //dge'o//
D374, Ga.1 1b1-33b7; Mu Kha.4; X Ka.11
372 Ts02.5 MW3CN1302rgyud Kha23CN1305rgyud
240a1-398a8 dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba shri DA kA r+N+N ba mahA yo gi nI tan tra ra dza nA ma dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ /rgya mtsho drug lasogs pa la rnal 'byor dang/ shos dang sdom pa dang bya ba dang de kho na nyid rgya mtshor gyur pa dang mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho las/ 'di rnams mi mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// dpal bal yul grub pa'i gnas chen yu tung lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por rgya gar gyi pan Ti ta chen po rdo rje slob dpon rtog ge pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu dus ding sang 'gran zla med pa snying rje chen pos thugs brlan pa'i ngang tshul can phyogs sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i skye 'gro rnams la chos dang zang zing gi char gyis tshim par mdzad pa dpal rdo rje phag mo'i zhabs kyi chu skyes kyi rdul la reg pa shA kya'i sras po rgyal ba'i zhal snga nas bod kyi lo tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong d+har+ma yon gyis mnyan cing bsgyur ba'o// //phyis gang zag chos kyi spyan can dpal mchog dang po'i rdo rje'i bka'i tshul dang yang btun te zhus gtugs legs par byas so/ /mkha' mnyam bde rdzogs sna tshogs sprul pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku/ /des gsungs dri med sna tshogs gdul bya'i bsam dbang gis/ /gsung gcig gis kyang sna tshogs don mang ston pas dpyad pa dka'/ /de ltar yin yang ji ltar mi bdag shing rta cher zhugs nas/ /g.yul ngor 'jug dus rkang gis bgrod rnams 'thab par mi brtson nam/ /de bzhin sngon gyi mkhas pa chen po rnams kyis rjes 'brangs nas/ /kho bos gzhan don nus min na'ang phan pa'i bsam pas bsgyur/ /'di la gzhung dang bla ma rang gi blo gros skyon gyis ni/ /sgra don 'gal 'gyur bcom ldan dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams dang/ /mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang bstan dga'i lha rnams mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod par rigs/ /'di las thob pa'i dge ba dri med cung zad des/ /'gro kun rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob gyur cig/ bdag gis srol btod tsam 'di la/ /sgra don 'jug pa mkhyen rnams kyi/ /srang gnyis smra bas gzigs pa na/ /skyon du gyur snang bcos par zhu/ /phrag dog sgo nas mi bya zhing//rjesu yid rang ba yang mdzod//rdzogs s+h+yo// fol. 240a: space for 2 miniatures; 240b blank; Eimer 1999 gives D 370 !?
D 372, Kha.2 137a1-264b7; S 337, Kha.1; Mu Ga.1; X Ga.1, Na.2; dupl. Ga.1 col Na.2 kürzer und mit Abweichungen; not in D; F, V, Z leicht anders; alle checken
372 Ts03.1 MW3CN1302rgyud Ga33CN1306rgyud
1b1-138b5 dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba shrI DA kA r+N+N ba mahA yo gi ni tan tra rA dza nA ma dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ /rgya mtsho drug las+wogs pa la rnal 'byor dang ye shes dang sdom pa dang bya ba dang mkha' de kho na nyid rgya 'tshor gyur ba dang mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho las/ 'di rnams mi mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba// //rdzogs so// dpal bal yul grub pa'i gnas chen yu tung lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por rgya rag gyi paN Ti ta chen po rdo rje slob dpon rtog ge ba rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu dus ding sang 'gran pa med pa snying rje chen pos thugs brlan pa'i ngang tshul can phyogs sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i skye 'gro rnams la chos dang zang zing gi char gyis tshim par mdzad pa dpal rdo rje phag mo'i zhabs kyi chu skyes kyi rdul la reg pa shA kya'i sras po rgyal ba'i zhal mnga' nas// bod kyi lo tstsha ba shAkya'i dge slong d+ha rma yon tan gyis mnyan cing bsgyur ba'o// //phyis gang zag chos kyi spyan can dpal mchog dang po'i rdo rje'i bka'i tshul dang yang bstun te/ /zhus gtugs legs par byas so/ /mkha' mnyam bde rdzogs sna tshogs sprul pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku/ /des gsungs dri med sna tshogs gdul bya'i bsam dbang gis/ /gsung gcig gis kyang sna tshogs don mang ston pas dpyad pa dka'/ de ltar yin yang ji ltar mi bdag shing rta cher zhugs nas/ /g.yul ngor 'jug dus rkang gis bgrod rnams 'thab par mi brtson nam/ /de bzhin sngon gyi mkhas pa chen po rnams kyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /kho bos gzhan don dus min na'ang phan pa'i bsam pas bsgyur/ /'di la gzhung dang bla ma rang gi blo gros skyon gyis ni/ /sgra don 'gal 'gyur bcom ldan dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams dang/ /mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang bstan dga'i lha rnams mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod par rigs/ /'di las thob pa'i dge ba dri med cung zad des/ /'gro kun rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob gyur cig/ /bdag gis srol btod tsam 'di la/ /sgra don 'jug pa mkhyen rnaMs kyi/ /skad gnyis smra bas gzigs pa na/ /skyon du gyur snang bcos par zhu/ /phrag dog sgo nas mi bya zhing/ /rjes su yid rang ba yang mdzod// rdzogs so// Eimer 1999 gives D 370 !?

373 Ts03.2 MW3CN1302rgyud Ga33CN1306rgyud
138b5-185b8 dpal bde mchog sdoM byung ba zhes bya ba shrI mahA saM b+ha rO dA ya tan+t+ra rA dza s+ya nA ma dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud chen po 'bum phrag gsum pa las// lhan cig skyes pa 'byung ba'i rtog pa las btus pa rnal 'byor thams cad kyi gsang ba// klags pas 'grub pa dpal sdom pa 'byung ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+h+yo// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po gzhan la phan pa mtha' yas dang// rgyus ban de smon lam grags kyis bsgyur ba// shes rab dman zhing sbyangs pa chung mod kyi// rgyud kyi gzhung la dad pa brtan pa skyes pas// rang don tsaM du bsgyur b gang lags pa// 'phags dang mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod par mdzod//
D 373, Kha.3 265a1-311a6; Mu Nga.1; X Ga.2
380 Ts03.3 MW3CN1302rgyud Ga33CN1306rgyud
186a1-186b7
rig pa 'dzin ma'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// rgya gar mkhas pa chen po dza ya'i zhabs dang/ btsun pa dar ma yon tan gyis sgyur ba'o// me tris phyung ba yin gsunng ngo// las dang po pa yin zhes spros pa la dga' na/ oM shrI he ru ka zhes pa nas hri ta yaM zhes pa yan chad kyi sngags kyang bzlas// chang dang sha dang zan lasogs pa'i gtor ma yang bsham la lag pa g.yon pas reg la yig gsum ji tsaM 'dod par bzlas pas bdud tsir bsams la// mkha' 'gro ma rnams mngon gsum du dmigs la// sngags rnams kyis bdul gzhan du na mi dgos so// go cha yang de dang de'i gnas su reg cing brjod pa lam// yang na brjod pa tsam mo// metri ba/ mA ma a/ shakya rak+Shi te/ ka na ka shrI/ dza yA se na/ des phyis rgya gar du byon nas bla ma a/ nyid la gsan no gsung ngo// lo ke sh+wa ra/ sa ba ri/ ma tri ba/ ka ma la badz+ra li la badz+ra/ lo tstsha wa// khang gsar ba la grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis gnos so// rgyud tshig// sgrub thabs/ smin byad/ u ba d+he sha bzhugs// sngar brgyud 'di'i bshad pa// bla ma gnyis las thos pa la/ de'i phyis bla ma khang gsar bas bsil ba'i tshal tu rnal 'byor pa sku ba thogs pa thog dang 'byal nas/ mos par byung ste/ chos 'di'i rgyud cig thos te/ gdam ngag 'dra mkhyen ne zhus pas shes gsung/ 'o na zhu byas pas do nod 'dir byin kyis brlabs kyis// rten 'brel tshol la shog gsung/ der sha dang chang lsogs pa khyer phyin nas// byin brlabs dang sgrub thabs man ngag dang bcas pas gnang ngo gsung skad do des grags pa rgyal mtshan la// des chos rje sa skya pan+Ti ta la/ des bla ma mar pa grags pa byang chub la/ des kho bo la gnang pa'o// beginning /titles and formula of veneration/ missing; colophon to be proofread
D 380, Ga.7 72b7-73a7; Mu Nga.2; X Ga.? - frag, Ba.16 Colophon!!
